input.sentences: it had been a long trip .
the crew was always glad to get back home .
once they docked it would be pandemonium .
because they 'd all be so happy to be home .
output.sentences: Our boating trip was nearing an end.
As we approached the port the crew seemed as happy as we were to be coming home.
We were most concerned about docking .
From a distance, as we sailed into port, the city skyline was magnificent.
At last we were home in our bustling metropolis.
